wikipedia_page.main: Wendy Sadler  is a British science communicator and lecturer at Cardiff University. She is the founding director of Science Made Simple which focuses on engaging audiences with the physical sciences. Her areas of interest include inspiring the next generation of scientists, engineers and communicators; women in STEM; and making STEM subjects accessible to diverse audiences.
